name: A fanged cloak of the gargantuan jell-o
data: It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It increases the users charisma impressively.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It gives small penalty to the skill 'attack'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'visualize act'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'allegro con foco'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance strongly.
It will lower the wearers ability to score hits in melee combat.
